attributes.action: Sepp Blatter to resign from FIFA
attributes.additional_details: Sepp Blatter has for many years groped our national sport with dirty hands. Qatar 2022 is all about how much money can be hidden in swiss bank accounts. With Platini paid in massaged ego and prostitutes, Sepp has a perfect ally. Let Britain stand up for the morale high ground that we should and tell the world this man is disgusting and pond life.
